戺字的基本解释

戺
shì
台阶两旁所砌的斜石：“金戺玉阶，彤庭辉辉。”
门槛：“属兵列护门戺。”

戺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》鉏里切，上止，崇。］
(1)门槛。
(2)堂廉。亦指堂廉下的台阶。《书·顾命》：“四人綦弁，執戈上刃，夾兩階戺。”孔传：“堂廉曰戺，士所立處。”《文选·张衡〈西京赋〉》：“金戺玉階，彤庭煇煇。”李善注引《广雅》：“戺，砌也。”唐刘禹锡《令狐相公见示赠竹二十韵》：“垂梢覆内屏，迸筍侵前戺。”章炳麟《新方言·释形体》：“浙西謂堂廉曰階檐戺。諸邊亦謂之戺。”一说戺为庭阶两旁自堂至地所砌的斜石。见清程瑶田《释宫小记》。

戺字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【户字部】　戺； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页415第03
【廣韻】【韻會】?鉏里切，音士。【爾雅·釋宮】落時謂之戺。◎按爾雅作?。疏，持樞也。詳?字註。　又堂廉曰戺。【書·顧命】四人綦弁執戈，夾兩階戺。　又砌也，閾也。【張衡·西京賦】金戺玉階。　又【集韻】巸，古作戺。註詳巳部六畫。

考證：〔堂簾以戺〕　謹照書孔傳堂簾改堂廉。
戺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
戺字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
door pivot
shì
The oblique stones laid on both sides of the steps: "Jinxu Jade Steps, Tongting Huihui."
Threshold: "The soldiers guard the gate."
door pivot
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" 鉏里切, top stop, Chong. ]
(1) Threshold.
(2) Tang Lian. It also refers to the steps under Tang Lian. "Shu·Gu Ming": "Four people, Qi Yi, hold on to the sword, and clamp the two steps." Kong Chuan: "Tang Lian said to succumb, the scholar stands." "Selected Works · Zhang Heng": " The jade stage of the Jinxu, the radiant garden is radiant." Li Shan quoted "Guangya": "Zhu, build it." Tang Liu Yuxi, "Linghu Xianggong sees the gift of bamboo twenty rhymes": "The vertical shoots cover the inner screen, and shoot shoots invade. Qianqian." Zhang Binglin, "New Dialects · Interpretation of Forms": "Western Zhejiang is said to be called eaves and eaves. All sides are also called eaves." It is said that Xing is a slanting stone built from the hall to the ground on both sides of the courtyard. See Qing Cheng Yaotian's "Small Notes of the Palace".
door pivot

[Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] Jinxu Yujie.　[Jiyun] again, ancient writing. Note that there are six paintings in detail.
